lead_paragraph: ISSELBACHER--Marga Schiff, (June 6, 1927-January 17, 2016). Loving mother of Tina and Jesse Isselbacher and grandmother of Kassidy Isselbacher Marino, Haley Singleton and Samantha Isselbacher. Devoted widow of Henry Isselbacher and sister to Robert (Bob) Schiff. Born in Oberthulba, she immigrated to the United States from Badkissingen at the age of nine, when she was sent by her parents alone to escape Nazi Germany. Her life was filled with the joys of marriage, parenthood and friendship and she gave of herself without reservation and with deep affection. She will be sorely missed by her immediate family and her sisters-in-law and nieces and nephews as well as the numerous friends for whom she cared so much during her full life. 1/3
